sentences.en: A full day’s teaching exhausts me.
sentences.cn: 讲一整天课令我精疲力竭。

sentences.en: Cars, trucks and buses produce exhaust nearly as harmful as the factories.
sentences.cn: 汽车 、 卡车和公共汽车排出的废气和工厂的废气差不多同样有害.

sentences.en: Clouds of thick black smoke billowed from the car's exhaust.
sentences.cn: 从汽车排气管冒出一股股黑色浓烟。

sentences.en: Exhaust fumes are bad for your health.
Exhaust fumes from cars are poisoning the air of our cities.
sentences.cn: 汽车排出的废气使我们城市中的空气遭受污染.

sentences.en: Exhaust fumes made him drowsy and brought on a headache.
sentences.cn: 废气把他熏得昏昏沉沉,还引起了头疼.

sentences.en: Having exhausted all other possibilities, I asked Jan to look after the baby.
sentences.cn: 各种可能的办法都行不通了，我只好请简来照料宝宝。

sentences.en: His exhaust fell off six laps from the finish.
sentences.cn: 离终点还有6圈时，他的排气管掉了下来。

sentences.en: The city's streets are filthy and choked with exhaust fumes.
sentences.cn: 那座城市的街道肮脏不堪，弥漫着令人窒息的废气。

sentences.en: the exhaust fumes that are polluting our cities
The exhaust valve on my car has burnt out.
sentences.cn: 我汽车上的排气阀烧掉了.

sentences.en: The health of our children is being endangered by exhaust fumes.
sentences.cn: 我们孩子们的健康正受到排放出的废气的损害。

sentences.en: The problem was that the exhaust gases contain many toxins.
sentences.cn: 问题在于废气中含有很多毒素。

sentences.en: There are many sources of air pollution ; exhaust fumes, for example.
sentences.cn: 空气污染有许多来源, 例如废气.

sentences.en: We are in danger of exhausting the world’s oil supply.
sentences.cn: 我们面临世界石油储备耗尽的危险。

sentences.en: When your exhaust falls off, you have to replace it.
sentences.cn: 如果你的排气管脱落，应将其更换。

sentences.en: You need to exhaust the air in the jar.
sentences.cn: 你需要把瓶中的空气抽尽.

words.tran_cn: 使筋疲力尽的；使耗尽的
耗尽；用尽；使…精疲力尽（exhaust的过去式）
耗尽；使…精疲力竭；排出（exhaust的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 排气扇；抽风机；排风机
废气再循环；废气再循环装置

trans.tran_en: a pipe on a car or machine that waste gases pass through

trans.tran_cn: 耗尽，使精疲力竭，详尽地讨论
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel extremely tired

trans.tran_cn: 使筋疲力尽；用尽；详尽论述
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel extremely tired
